subject: Brice here
body:
This is what you are looking for. Call for infomation on how you can generate up to 3k each and every day of the week. Dial this number for details.

Oh the sun is shining and things are better each day.

I get to stay home and relax on my porch while I simply return phone calls
each day. This can be you also if you want it to be.

The potential to generate up to $3OOO each week is there
so pick up that telephone and call my information line.

800-691-4552




Get back to me via Mcgee1Mcgee@comease.com if not lnterested





If this system was some person, I would have killed it by now. It tortured me, refrained me from living a life of my own, but I never cared because I don't care about myself much. I don't care who does what to me. But Mia, these people harmed Mia and I care about her. I care about her more than anything in this world. I forgot every injustice ever done to me but I could never forgive the tyranny inflicted upon Mia.
